dexp

Add¶

add¶

add [OPTIONS] [INPUT_PATHS]...

Options

-o, --output_path <output_path>¶
-c, --channels <channels>¶

List of channels, all channels when ommited.

-rc, --rename <rename>¶

You can rename channels: e.g. if channels are ‘channel1,anotherc’ then ‘gfp,rfp’ would rename the ‘channel1’ channel to ‘gfp’, and ‘anotherc’ to ‘rfp’

-st, --store <store>¶

Zarr store: ‘dir’, ‘ndir’, or ‘zip’

Default

dir

-w, --overwrite¶

Forces overwrite of target

Default

False

Arguments

INPUT_PATHS¶

Optional argument(s)
